title: Associate Technical Support Engineer
full_description: Healthgrades is focused on providing trusted information that allows consumers to receive more transparency and confidence around their healthcare. As an Associate Technical Support Engineer, you will join the Healthgrades Technical Support Team where you will triage and provide support for external and internal client support questions and issues related to the company's products and applications.What you will do:Manage the Technical Support team's ticket intake and route tickets to the appropriate teamCollaborate with multiple departments for proper triaging and resolution of multifaceted issuesAttend daily engineering stand ups to facilitate knowledge sharing and collaboration between teamsAssist with systems administrative tasks, such as setting up user permissions and granting user access to various tools, as neededWhat you will bring:Associate's Degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or equivalent experienceWillingness and ability to learn new processes and technologiesKnowledge of computer systems, user interfaces, databases, networks, and/or mobile applicationsAbility to communicate and collaborate with multi-functional teamsAbility to set priorities and manage time to complete tasks and meet deadlinesBonus: understanding of REST APIs and experience using JiraWhy Healthgrades?At Healthgrades, we recognize that our people drive our greatest achievements. We are passionate about maintaining a fulfilling, rewarding and high-energy work environment while setting the stage for your continued success.Purpose-Driven Business - we help people make more confident healthcare decisionsChanging the Game - dynamic, employee-focused culture with career advancement opportunitiesCommunity Builders - partners of local charity organizations, matching gifts program, Go-Green efforts, and wellness initiativesCompensation & BenefitsSalary: $40,000-$50,000 annuallyBonus: up to 5% annually401(k) plan optionsMedical, dental, and vision insurance, with HSA contributions for qualifying plansCompany-funded basic Life, AD&D, and disability coverageFamily planning resourcesSubsidized wellness benefitsPTO plus paid holiday and volunteer timeTuition reimbursement and learning & development programs*Actual base pay will be determined based on qualifications and experience
